post.body: why cant anything be easy?
just know ill always be there to help as much as i can....
that sounds like a plan! Its gonna work out... It has too...
still there?
welcome to the morning
not unless you can get menas fam a place, and then a place for us.... Soon....
life isnt being kind to mena bee or me right now........
you dumbass...... Stop being insensitive right now..... Its not the time...........
NO! Whats wrong with this world! Why is this happening?
it will all work out.... Not like youre leaving SoCal.....
move to sac with me! Jk, i know how you feel tho...
david! I think i killded mena bee by heart attack........
im sorry.....
its my favorite horror series.... I didnt cause the panic attack did i?
sorry, i got Saw on my mind right now....
now you have the chance to prove yourself, do you have what it takes to toture her to death? Or die with the stress of life?
lets play a game... Hello monica, all youre life youve lived in the shadow of your sister,
Who can find me a sharp knife, some needles, and rubbing alcohol?
Id like to sleep in for once in my life.... Ive been up for an hour!
Are either of you on?
